topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: Upgrading HPE Helion OpenStack to Version 2.1

body.p: When upgrading HPE Helion OpenStack from version 2.0 to 2.1, shutting down the virtual machines which run the control plane will also affect the services that make up the HPE Helion Development Platform.
Perform these additional steps to safely shut down these specific services prior to upgrading and then to restart them after the upgrade is complete.

topic.title: Upgrade HPE Helion OpenStack to version 2.1

body.p: For complete instructions on how to upgrade HPE Helion OpenStack, see the Upgrade Documentation.
